description.content:
Hello


I am a web developer and designer working on WordPress and other web technologies for the past 8 years and made 50+ responsive websites for various brands and companies.


I have worked on WordPress, eCommerce websites, etc. with responsive design, cross-browser and device compatibility.


If you want to get your Wordpress site today, you are at the right gig !


Our Services


  • WordPress & Theme installation and Customization
  • Blog, News, and Personal  
  • E-commerce website Creation
  • Landing Page Design
  • Business and Portfolio 
  • Health
  • Real estate Website
  • woocommerce Product Data Entry
  • Educational website
  • Any kind of site that you want to build on WordPress
  • Fix Bugs and Errors


Be it a responsive layout, conventional SEO, search engine optimized Google rankings, social media, or security, we've covered you.


ORDER NOW TO GET STARTED!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all websites we create will be responsive and look good on all devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer website hosting or domain registration?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can help with domain registration, web hosting, and anything else regarding your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is it easy to manage the website after it’s developed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, wordPress is very user-friendly. You will be able to alter the website's text and images with ease. You'll even be able to add new pages if desired.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
The requirements for the website include 
- Domain name
- Web hosting to host the website
- Content for each page on the website
- Logo files or color preferences for the website (if any)
- Reference website (if any)

packageList.title: Starter
packageList.description: Basic WordPress website with 1 page, 3 sections, slider, contact form.

packageList.title: Recommended
packageList.description: Premium 3-4  Pages Responsive Design with  Contact Form, Parallax Effect & blogs

packageList.title: eCommerce
packageList.description: eCommerce Website with up to 10 pages, Responsive Design, Fast, Payment gateway integrated and Basic
